testsuite.name: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the assignment "Password"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I click the new question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I enter valid information for the question name as "Test Question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I see the ckeditor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I choose "True/False" link from the dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: When I click on the set policies tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I select the Proctored Exam radio button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I set the password authorization checkbox to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I set the assignment password to be "test"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I set the grade authorization checkbox to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I set the maximum attempts to 1
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I save & close the assignment on the policies page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: Then the new lesson "Password" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I start the "Password" proctored assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: When I am on the assignment authorization page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: Then The assignment password entry is present
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: When I authorize with assignment password "test"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: When I submit the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I see the submission report with warning text "Warning: There appears to be errors in one or more of your answers."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: When I submit the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: When I am on the assignment authorization page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: Then The assignment password entry is present
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I authorize with assignment password "test"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And quit and save the assignment without switching frames
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: When I start the "Password" proctored assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: And I am on the assignment authorization page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: Then The assignment password entry is absent
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check that assignment password is displayed only when it should be
